#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		char str[201];
		int alpha[123]={0};
		cin>>str;
		int i=0;
		while(str[i]!='\0')
		{
			alpha[str[i]]++;
			i++;
		}
		int count=0;
		for(i=65;i<123;i++)
		{
			if(alpha[i]!=0)
			count+=alpha[i]/2+alpha[i]%2;
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
